mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EKA.MST_POLICY ( REG_SPAJ, LSTB_ID, LCA_ID , LWK_ID, LSRG_ID , LSSP_ID , LSPD_ID, MSPO_POLICY_HOLDER , LSRE_ID , MSPO_AGE , LKU_ID , LSCB_ID, LUS_ID , MSPO_INS_PERIOD, MSPO_PAY_PERIOD , MSPO_PROSES_BILL, MSPO_INSTALLMENT , MSPO_REF_BII , MSPO_DATE_PRINT, MSPO_DATE_SPEC , MSPO_DATE_TTP , MSPO_PRIBADI, MSPO_AO, MSPO_CUSTOMER , MSPO_NO_BLANKO ,MSPO_UMUR_BEASISWA , MSPO_FOLLOW_UP, MSPO_KOMISI_BII , MSPO_INPUT_DATE , MSPO_PROVIDER , LSTP_ID ,MSPO_JENIS_TERBIT ,MSPO_NASABAH_DCIF, MSPO_FLAT, MSPO_NASABAH_ACC, MSPO_JOINT_POLICY, MSPO_LEADER , MSPO_SPAJ_DATE, MSPO_BEG_DATE, MSPO_END_DATE , MSPO_SYAHRIAH, APPLICATION_ID_DMTM, CF_JOB_CODE, CF_CUSTOMER_ID, CF_CAMPAIGN_CODE, MSPO_NO_KERJASAMA ) values ( upper(#{datausulan.reg_spaj:VARCHAR}), 1, upper(#{agen.lca_id:VARCHAR}) , upper(#{agen.lwk_id:VARCHAR}), upper(#{agen.lsrg_id:VARCHAR}) , 10, 118, upper(#{pemegang.mspo_policy_holder:VARCHAR}) , (#{pemegang.lsre_id:INTEGER}), (#{pemegang.mspo_age:INTEGER}), upper(#{datausulan.lku_id:VARCHAR}) , (#{datausulan.lscb_id:INTEGER}), (#{datausulan.lus_id:INTEGER}) , (#{datausulan.mspo_ins_period:INTEGER}), (#{datausulan.mspo_pay_period:INTEGER}) , 0, (#{datausulan.mspo_installment:INTEGER}), (#{pemegang.mspo_ref_bii:INTEGER}) , (#{datausulan.mspo_date_print:DATE}), (#{datausulan.mspo_date_spec:DATE}), (#{datausulan.mspo_date_ttp:DATE}) , (#{pemegang.mspo_pribadi:INTEGER}), upper(#{pemegang.mspo_ao:VARCHAR}), upper(#{pemegang.mspo_customer:VARCHAR}) , upper(#{pemegang.mspo_no_blanko:VARCHAR}) ,(#{tertanggung.mspo_umur_beasiswa:INTEGER}) , (#{pemegang.mspo_follow_up:INTEGER}), (#{pemegang.mspo_komisi_bii:INTEGER}), SYSDATE , (#{datausulan.mspo_provider:INTEGER}) , (#{datausulan.lstp_id:INTEGER}) , 1, #{pemegang.mspo_nasabah_dcif:VARCHAR}, #{pemegang.mspo_flat:INTEGER}, #{datausulan.mspo_nasabah_acc:VARCHAR}, #{datausulan.kopiSPAJ:VARCHAR}, #{pemegang.mspo_leader:VARCHAR} , SYSDATE, (#{datausulan.mspo_beg_date:DATE}), (#{datausulan.mspo_end_date:DATE}) , (#{datausulan.mspo_syahriah:INTEGER}), (#{pemegang.application_id:VARCHAR}), (#{pemegang.cf_job_code:VARCHAR}), (#{pemegang.cf_customer_id:VARCHAR}), (#{pemegang.cf_campaign_code:VARCHAR}), (#{pemegang.mspo_no_kerjasama:VARCHAR}) )

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_POLICY ( REG_SPAJ, LSTB_ID, LCA_ID , LWK_ID, LSRG_ID , LSSP_ID , LSPD_ID, MSPO_POLICY_HOLDER , LSRE_ID , MSPO_AGE , LKU_ID , LSCB_ID, LUS_ID , MSPO_INS_PERIOD, MSPO_PAY_PERIOD , MSPO_PROSES_BILL, MSPO_INSTALLMENT , MSPO_REF_BII , MSPO_DATE_PRINT, MSPO_DATE_SPEC , MSPO_DATE_TTP , MSPO_PRIBADI, MSPO_AO, MSPO_CUSTOMER , MSPO_NO_BLANKO ,MSPO_UMUR_BEASISWA , MSPO_FOLLOW_UP, MSPO_KOMISI_BII , MSPO_INPUT_DATE , MSPO_PROVIDER , LSTP_ID ,MSPO_JENIS_TERBIT ,MSPO_NASABAH_DCIF, MSPO_FLAT, MSPO_NASABAH_ACC, MSPO_JOINT_POLICY, MSPO_LEADER , MSPO_SPAJ_DATE, MSPO_BEG_DATE, MSPO_END_DATE , MSPO_SYAHRIAH, APPLICATION_ID_DMTM, CF_JOB_CODE, CF_CUSTOMER_ID, CF_CAMPAIGN_CODE, MSPO_NO_KERJASAMA, MSPO_SPV_DMTM ) values ( upper(#{datausulan.reg_spaj:VARCHAR}), 1, upper(#{agen.lca_id:VARCHAR}) , upper(#{agen.lwk_id:VARCHAR}), upper(#{agen.lsrg_id:VARCHAR}) , 10, 4, upper(#{pemegang.mspo_policy_holder:VARCHAR}) , (#{pemegang.lsre_id:INTEGER}), (#{pemegang.mspo_age:INTEGER}), upper(#{datausulan.lku_id:VARCHAR}) , (#{datausulan.lscb_id:INTEGER}), (#{datausulan.lus_id:INTEGER}) , (#{datausulan.mspo_ins_period:INTEGER}), (#{datausulan.mspo_pay_period:INTEGER}) , 0, (#{datausulan.mspo_installment:INTEGER}), (#{pemegang.mspo_ref_bii:INTEGER}) , (#{datausulan.mspo_date_print:DATE}), (#{datausulan.mspo_date_spec:DATE}), (#{datausulan.mspo_date_ttp:DATE}) , (#{pemegang.mspo_pribadi:INTEGER}), upper(#{pemegang.mspo_ao:VARCHAR}), upper(#{pemegang.mspo_customer:VARCHAR}) , upper(#{pemegang.mspo_no_blanko:VARCHAR}) ,(#{tertanggung.mspo_umur_beasiswa:INTEGER}) , (#{pemegang.mspo_follow_up:INTEGER}), (#{pemegang.mspo_komisi_bii:INTEGER}), SYSDATE , (#{datausulan.mspo_provider:INTEGER}) , (#{datausulan.lstp_id:INTEGER}) , 1, #{pemegang.mspo_nasabah_dcif:VARCHAR}, #{pemegang.mspo_flat:INTEGER}, #{datausulan.mspo_nasabah_acc:VARCHAR}, #{datausulan.kopiSPAJ:VARCHAR}, #{pemegang.mspo_leader:VARCHAR} , SYSDATE, (#{datausulan.mspo_beg_date:DATE}), (#{datausulan.mspo_end_date:DATE}) , (#{datausulan.mspo_syahriah:INTEGER}), (#{pemegang.application_id:VARCHAR}), (#{pemegang.cf_job_code:VARCHAR}), (#{pemegang.cf_customer_id:VARCHAR}), (#{pemegang.cf_campaign_code:VARCHAR}), (#{pemegang.mspo_no_kerjasama:VARCHAR}), (#{pemegang.spv:VARCHAR}) )

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_INSURED ( REG_SPAJ, MSTE_INSURED_NO, MSTE_INSURED , MSTE_AGE, MSTE_MEDICAL, MSTE_STANDARD , LSPD_ID , LUS_ID, MSTE_FLAG_UW, MSTE_KYC_DATE, MSTE_KYC_LUS_ID , MSTE_BEG_DATE, MSTE_END_DATE , MSTE_INPUT_DATE , MSTE_BACKUP, LSSA_ID, MSTE_REAS , MSTE_ACTIVE, MSTE_DEWASA, MSTE_FLAG_CC, MSTE_TGL_AKSEP, MSTE_TGL_SPAJ_DOC , MSTE_TGL_RECUR, MSTE_PCT_DPLK , MSTE_FLAG_EL ,MSTE_FLAG_INVESTASI, MSTE_FLAG_GUTHRIE, MSTE_SPAJ_ASLI, MSTE_FLAG_REF_TELEMARKET, MSTE_NO_VACC ) values ( upper(#{datausulan.reg_spaj:VARCHAR}), 1, upper(#{tertanggung.mste_insured:VARCHAR}) , (#{tertanggung.mste_age:INTEGER}), (#{datausulan.mste_medical:INTEGER}), 0 , 4, (#{pemegang.lus_id:INTEGER}), 0, SYSDATE, (#{pemegang.lus_id:INTEGER}) , (#{datausulan.mste_beg_date:DATE}), (#{datausulan.mste_end_date:DATE}), SYSDATE , 0,(#{datausulan.lssa_id:INTEGER}),0 , 1, (#{pemegang.mste_dewasa:INTEGER}), (#{datausulan.mste_flag_cc:INTEGER}), SYSDATE, SYSDATE , (#{pemegang.mste_tgl_recur:DATE}) , (#{pemegang.mste_pct_dplk:NUMERIC}) ,(#{datausulan.mste_flag_el:INTEGER}) ,(#{datausulan.mste_flag_investasi:INTEGER}), (#{pemegang.mste_flag_guthrie:INTEGER}), #{pemegang.mste_spaj_asli:NUMERIC}, #{tertanggung.mste_flag_ref_telemarket:INTEGER}, #{tertanggung.mste_no_vacc:VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_INSURED ( REG_SPAJ, MSTE_INSURED_NO, MSTE_INSURED , MSTE_AGE, MSTE_MEDICAL, MSTE_STANDARD , LSPD_ID , LUS_ID, MSTE_FLAG_UW, MSTE_KYC_DATE, MSTE_KYC_LUS_ID , MSTE_BEG_DATE, MSTE_END_DATE , MSTE_INPUT_DATE , MSTE_BACKUP, LSSA_ID, MSTE_REAS , MSTE_ACTIVE, MSTE_DEWASA, MSTE_FLAG_CC, MSTE_TGL_AKSEP, MSTE_TGL_SPAJ_DOC , MSTE_TGL_RECUR, MSTE_PCT_DPLK , MSTE_FLAG_EL ,MSTE_FLAG_INVESTASI, MSTE_FLAG_GUTHRIE, MSTE_SPAJ_ASLI, MSTE_FLAG_REF_TELEMARKET, MSTE_NO_VACC ) values ( upper(#{datausulan.reg_spaj:VARCHAR}), 1, upper(#{tertanggung.mste_insured:VARCHAR}) , (#{tertanggung.mste_age:INTEGER}), (#{datausulan.mste_medical:INTEGER}), 0 , 118, (#{pemegang.lus_id:INTEGER}), 0, SYSDATE, (#{pemegang.lus_id:INTEGER}) , (#{datausulan.mste_beg_date:DATE}), (#{datausulan.mste_end_date:DATE}), SYSDATE , 0,(#{datausulan.lssa_id:INTEGER}),0 , 1, (#{pemegang.mste_dewasa:INTEGER}), (#{datausulan.mste_flag_cc:INTEGER}), SYSDATE, SYSDATE , (#{pemegang.mste_tgl_recur:DATE}) , (#{pemegang.mste_pct_dplk:NUMERIC}) ,(#{datausulan.mste_flag_el:INTEGER}) ,(#{datausulan.mste_flag_investasi:INTEGER}), (#{pemegang.mste_flag_guthrie:INTEGER}), #{pemegang.mste_spaj_asli:NUMERIC}, #{tertanggung.mste_flag_ref_telemarket:INTEGER}, #{tertanggung.mste_no_vacc:VARCHAR} )

insert into eka.mst_client_new( mcl_id, mcl_jenis, mcl_blacklist, mcl_tgl_input, lus_id, mcl_data_salah, mcl_gelar, lside_id, mspe_no_identity, lsed_id, lgj_id, ljb_id, mpn_job_desc, mspe_mother, mspe_sex, mspe_place_birth, lsag_id, mspe_sts_mrt, lsne_id, mspe_lama_kerja, mspe_date_birth, mspe_email, mkl_tujuan, mkl_penghasilan, mkl_pendanaan, mkl_kerja, mkl_industri, mcl_agama, mkl_red_flag, mcl_first, lti_id ) values( #{mcl_id_new:VARCHAR}, #{mcl_jenis:INTEGER}, #{mcl_blacklist:INTEGER}, #{mcl_tgl_input:DATE}, #{lus_id:INTEGER}, #{mcl_data_salah:INTEGER}, #{mcl_gelar:VARCHAR}, #{lside_id:INTEGER}, #{mspe_no_identity:VARCHAR}, #{lsed_id:INTEGER}, #{lgj_id:INTEGER}, #{ljb_id:INTEGER}, #{mpn_job_desc:VARCHAR}, #{mspe_mother:VARCHAR}, #{mspe_sex:INTEGER}, #{mspe_place_birth:VARCHAR}, #{lsag_id:INTEGER}, #{mspe_sts_mrt:VARCHAR}, #{lsne_id:INTEGER}, #{mspe_lama_kerja:INTEGER}, #{mspe_date_birth:DATE}, #{mspe_email:VARCHAR}, #{mkl_tujuan:VARCHAR}, #{mkl_penghasilan:VARCHAR}, #{mkl_pendanaan:VARCHAR}, #{mkl_smbr_penghasilan:VARCHAR}, #{mkl_kerja:VARCHAR}, #{mkl_industri:VARCHAR}, #{mcl_agama:VARCHAR}, #{mkl_red_flag:INTEGER}, #{mcl_first:VARCHAR}, #{lti_id:INTEGER} )

insert into eka.mst_address_new (mcl_id, kd_pos_rumah, kota_rumah, area_code_rumah, telpon_rumah, alamat_kantor, kd_pos_kantor, kota_kantor, area_code_kantor, telpon_kantor, email, no_hp, no_hp2, no_fax, area_code_rumah2, telpon_rumah2, area_code_kantor2, telpon_kantor2, area_code_fax, alamat_rumah ) values ( #{mcl_id_new:VARCHAR}, #{kd_pos_rumah:VARCHAR}, #{kota_rumah:VARCHAR}, #{area_code_rumah:VARCHAR}, #{telpon_rumah:VARCHAR}, #{alamat_kantor:VARCHAR}, #{kd_pos_kantor:VARCHAR}, #{kota_kantor:VARCHAR}, #{area_code_kantor:VARCHAR}, #{telpon_kantor:VARCHAR}, #{email:VARCHAR}, #{no_hp:VARCHAR}, #{no_hp2:VARCHAR}, #{no_fax:VARCHAR}, #{area_code_rumah2:VARCHAR}, #{telpon_rumah2:VARCHAR}, #{area_code_kantor2:VARCHAR}, #{telpon_kantor2:VARCHAR}, #{area_code_fax:VARCHAR}, #{alamat_rumah:VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO eka.mst_pas_sms( msp_kode_sts_sms, msp_desc_sts_sms, msp_mobile, msp_mobile2, msp_text, msp_message_date, msp_receive_date, msp_full_name, msp_identity_no, msp_identity_no_tt, msp_date_of_birth, msp_pas_nama_pp, msp_pas_dob_pp, msp_pas_tmp_lhr_pp, msp_pas_email, msp_pas_tmp_lhr_tt, produk, msp_tgl_debet, msp_tgl_valid, kode_ao, msp_address_1, msp_address_2, msp_city, msp_rek_nama, msp_rek_nama_autodebet, msp_rek_kota, msp_rek_cabang, msp_postal_code, dist, pin, no_kartu, lspd_id, lssp_id, lsbp_id, lsbp_id_autodebet, msp_pas_accept_date, msp_pas_beg_date, msp_pas_end_date, msp_fire_accept_date, lsre_id, msp_fire_beg_date, msp_fire_end_date, msp_fire_policy_no, msp_fire_code_name, msp_fire_name, msp_fire_identity, msp_fire_id, msp_fire_occupation, msp_fire_type_business, msp_fire_source_fund, msp_fire_address_1, msp_fire_phone_number, msp_fire_email, msp_fire_okupasi, msp_fire_postal_code, msp_fire_mobile, msp_fire_insured_addr_code, msp_fire_addr_code, msp_fire_insured_addr, msp_fire_insured_postal_code, msp_fire_insured_addr_no, msp_flag_cc, msp_sex_pp, msp_sex_tt, msp_fire_insured_addr_envir, msp_fire_date_of_birth, msp_no_rekening, msp_no_rekening_autodebet, msag_id, msp_age, lus_id, mspo_policy_no, reg_spaj, msp_fire_insured_city, msp_fire_insured_phone_number, msp_pas_phone_number, msp_fire_okupasi_else, msp_fire_ins_addr_envir_else, lscb_id, msp_flag_aksep, msp_flag_pas, msp_fire_create_date, msp_pas_create_date, msp_fire_jenis, pribadi, msag_id_pp, msp_exist_bp, msp_warga, msp_warga_else, msp_status_nikah, msp_agama, msp_pendidikan, msp_pendidikan_else, msp_occupation, msp_occupation_else, msp_company_name, msp_company_usaha, msp_company_jabatan, msp_company_address, msp_company_postal_code, msp_company_phone_number, msp_cek_ktp, msp_cek_srt_keterangan, msp_cek_kk, msp_cek_npwp, msp_cek_bukti_bayar, msp_cek_rekening, msp_cek_ktp_uw, msp_cek_srt_keterangan_uw, msp_cek_kk_uw, msp_cek_npwp_uw, msp_cek_bukti_bayar_uw, msp_cek_rekening_uw, lsag_id, msp_exist_bp_name, msp_area_code_rumah, lside_id, msp_company_area_code, lrb_id, msp_admin_date, mspo_plan_provider, jenis_pas, msp_up, msp_premi, flag_val_send,msp_cek_akte_kelahiran,msp_cek_akte_kelahiran_uw, msp_cek_tandatangan, msp_cek_tandatangan_uw, product_code, mcl_id_pp, mcl_id_tt, msp_still_bp, msp_partner_exist_bp, msp_partner_still_bp, lju_id, application_id, reff_id, lcb_no, lcb_reff) VALUES( upper(trim(#{msp_kode_sts_sms,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_desc_sts_sms,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), trim(#{msp_mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), trim(#{msp_mobile2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), upper(trim(#{msp_text,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), #{msp_message_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{msp_receive_date,jdbcType=DATE}, upper(trim(#{msp_full_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), trim(#{msp_identity_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), trim(#{msp_identity_no_tt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{msp_date_of_birth,jdbcType=DATE}, upper(trim(#{msp_pas_nama_pp,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), #{msp_pas_dob_pp,jdbcType=DATE}, upper(trim(#{msp_pas_tmp_lhr_pp,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_pas_email,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_pas_tmp_lhr_tt,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), #{produk,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_tgl_debet,jdbcType=DATE}, #{msp_tgl_valid,jdbcType=DATE}, upper(trim(#{kode_ao,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_address_1,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_address_2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_rek_nama,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_rek_nama_autodebet,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_rek_kota,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_rek_cabang,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_postal_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), #{dist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no_kartu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspd_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lssp_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lsbp_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lsbp_id_autodebet,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_pas_accept_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{msp_pas_beg_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{msp_pas_end_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{msp_fire_accept_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lsre_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_fire_beg_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{msp_fire_end_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{msp_fire_policy_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upper(trim(#{msp_fire_code_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_fire_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_fire_identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), #{msp_fire_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upper(trim(#{msp_fire_occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_fire_type_business,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_fire_source_fund,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_fire_address_1,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), trim(#{msp_fire_phone_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), upper(trim(#{msp_fire_email,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim( #{msp_fire_okupasi,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), trim(#{msp_fire_postal_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), trim(#{msp_fire_mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), upper(trim(#{msp_fire_insured_addr_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_fire_addr_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_fire_insured_addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), trim(#{msp_fire_insured_postal_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), upper(trim(#{msp_fire_insured_addr_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), #{msp_flag_cc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_sex_pp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_sex_tt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, upper(trim(#{msp_fire_insured_addr_envir,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), #{msp_fire_date_of_birth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{msp_no_rekening,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msp_no_rekening_autodebet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msag_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msp_age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lus_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mspo_policy_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reg_spaj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upper(trim(#{msp_fire_insured_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), trim(#{msp_fire_insured_phone_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), trim(#{msp_pas_phone_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), upper(trim(#{msp_fire_okupasi_else,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_fire_ins_addr_envir_else,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), #{lscb_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 0, #{msp_flag_pas,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_fire_create_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{msp_pas_create_date,jdbcType=DATE}, 0, #{pribadi,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msag_id_pp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msp_exist_bp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_warga,jdbcType=INTEGER}, upper(trim(#{msp_warga_else,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), #{msp_status_nikah,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_agama,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msp_pendidikan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, upper(trim(#{msp_pendidikan_else,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), #{msp_occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upper(trim(#{msp_occupation_else,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_company_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), #{msp_company_usaha,jdbcType=INTEGER}, upper(trim( #{msp_company_jabatan,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_company_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msp_company_postal_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), #{msp_company_phone_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msp_cek_ktp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_cek_srt_keterangan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_cek_kk,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_cek_npwp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_cek_bukti_bayar,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_cek_rekening,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_cek_ktp_uw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_cek_srt_keterangan_uw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_cek_kk_uw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_cek_npwp_uw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_cek_bukti_bayar_uw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_cek_rekening_uw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lsag_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, upper(trim(#{msp_exist_bp_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), #{msp_area_code_rumah,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lside_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_company_area_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrb_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_admin_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{mspo_plan_provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jenis_pas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msp_up,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msp_premi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, #{msp_cek_akte_kelahiran,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_cek_akte_kelahiran_uw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_cek_tandatangan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_cek_tandatangan_uw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{product_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mcl_id_pp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mcl_id_tt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msp_still_bp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_partner_exist_bp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msp_partner_still_bp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lju_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{application_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reff_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lcb_no,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lcb_reff,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
select msp_id from eka.mst_pas_sms where no_kartu = #{no_kartu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

INSERT INTO eka.mst_position_spaj_pas (reg_id, msps_date, lspd_id, lssp_id, lus_id, msps_desc) SELECT a.msp_fire_id, SYSDATE + (#{addSecond,jdbcType=INTEGER} * (1/115200)), a.lspd_id, a.lssp_id, upper(trim(#{lus_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msps_desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) FROM eka.mst_pas_sms a WHERE a.msp_fire_id = upper(trim(#{reg_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) AND ROWNUM = 1
INSERT INTO EKA.MST_STS_CLIENT ( MCL_ID, LJC_ID, MSC_TGL_STS, MSC_ACTIVE ) VALUES ( #{mcl_id:VARCHAR}, #{ljc_id:INTEGER}, sysdate, #{msc_active:INTEGER} )

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_SIMULTANEOUS ( MCL_ID, MSSM_NUMBER, REG_SPAJ, MSTE_INSURED_NO, MSSM_PEMEGANG ,ID_SIMULTAN) VALUES ( #{s_client:VARCHAR}, #{l_simultan_no:INTEGER}, #{txtnospaj:VARCHAR}, #{mste_insured_no:INTEGER}, #{j:INTEGER},#{id_simultan:VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO EKA.M_SAR_TEMP ( REG_SPAJ, reg_spaj_ref, CNT, NO_POLIS, BISNIS_ID, BISNIS_NO, KURS_ID, SAR, STS_POLIS, MEDIS) VALUES (#{txtnospaj:VARCHAR}, #{reg_spaj_ref:VARCHAR}, #{li_cnt:INTEGER}, #{ls_polis:VARCHAR}, #{li_bisnis_id:INTEGER}, #{li_bisnis_no:INTEGER}, #{ls_kurs_id:VARCHAR}, #{ldec_sar:NUMERIC}, #{li_sts_polis:INTEGER}, #{li_medis:INTEGER} )

INSERT INTO EKA.M_REAS_TEMP(reg_spaj,pemegang,mste_reas,extra_mortality,lku_id,nil_kurs, simultan_tr_rd,tsi_tr_rd,sar_tr_rd,retensi_tr_rd,reas_tr_rd, simultan_life,tsi_life,sar_life,retensi_life,reas_life, simultan_ssp,tsi_ssp,sar_ssp,retensi_ssp,reas_ssp, simultan_pa_in,tsi_pa_in,sar_pa_in,retensi_pa_in,reas_pa_in, simultan_pa_rd,tsi_pa_rd,sar_pa_rd,retensi_pa_rd,reas_pa_rd, simultan_pk_in,tsi_pk_in,sar_pk_in,retensi_pk_in,reas_pk_in, simultan_pk_rd,tsi_pk_rd,sar_pk_rd,retensi_pk_rd,reas_pk_rd, simultan_ssh,tsi_ssh,sar_ssh,retensi_ssh,reas_ssh,tipe) VALUES(#{reg_spaj:VARCHAR},#{pemegang:INTEGER},#{mste_reas:INTEGER},#{extra_mortality:NUMERIC},#{lku_id:VARCHAR},#{nil_kurs:NUMERIC}, #{simultan_tr_rd:NUMERIC},#{tsi_tr_rd:NUMERIC},#{sar_tr_rd:NUMERIC},#{retensi_tr_rd:NUMERIC},#{reas_tr_rd:NUMERIC}, #{simultan_life:NUMERIC},#{tsi_life:NUMERIC},#{sar_life:NUMERIC},#{retensi_life:NUMERIC},#{reas_life:NUMERIC}, #{simultan_ssp:NUMERIC},#{tsi_ssp:NUMERIC},#{sar_ssp:NUMERIC},#{retensi_ssp:NUMERIC},#{reas_ssp:NUMERIC}, #{simultan_pa_in:NUMERIC},#{tsi_pa_in:NUMERIC},#{sar_pa_in:NUMERIC},#{retensi_pa_in:NUMERIC},#{reas_pa_in:NUMERIC}, #{simultan_pa_rd:NUMERIC},#{tsi_pa_rd:NUMERIC},#{sar_pa_rd:NUMERIC},#{retensi_pa_rd:NUMERIC},#{reas_pa_rd:NUMERIC}, #{simultan_pk_in:NUMERIC},#{tsi_pk_in:NUMERIC},#{sar_pk_in:NUMERIC},#{retensi_pk_in:NUMERIC},#{reas_pk_in:NUMERIC}, #{simultan_pk_rd:NUMERIC},#{tsi_pk_rd:NUMERIC},#{sar_pk_rd:NUMERIC},#{retensi_pk_rd:NUMERIC},#{reas_pk_rd:NUMERIC}, #{simultan_ssh:NUMERIC},#{tsi_ssh:NUMERIC},#{sar_ssh:NUMERIC},#{retensi_ssh:NUMERIC},#{reas_ssh:NUMERIC},#{tipe:INTEGER})

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_BILLING ( REG_SPAJ, MSBI_TAHUN_KE, MSBI_PREMI_KE, MSBI_BEG_DATE, MSBI_END_DATE, MSBI_DUE_DATE, MSBI_AKTIF_DATE, LKU_ID, MSBI_POLICY_COST, MSBI_HCR_POLICY_COST, MSBI_TTL_CARD_COST, MSBI_STAMP, MSBI_INPUT_DATE, MSBI_REMAIN, MSBI_PAID, MSBI_ACTIVE, MSBI_PRINT, MSBI_ADD_BILL, LUS_ID, LSPD_ID, LCA_ID, LWK_ID, MSBI_FLAG_TOPUP, LSRG_ID, MSBI_TH_BAK, MSBI_PREMI_BAK, MSBI_PERSEN_PAID, MSBI_TGL_DEBET, MSBI_NB ) VALUES ( #{reg_spaj:VARCHAR}, #{msbi_tahun_ke:INTEGER}, #{msbi_premi_ke:INTEGER}, #{msbi_beg_date:DATE}, #{msbi_end_date:DATE}, #{msbi_due_date:DATE}, #{msbi_aktif_date:DATE}, #{lku_id:VARCHAR}, #{msbi_policy_cost:NUMERIC}, #{msbi_hcr_policy_cost:NUMERIC}, #{msbi_ttl_card_cost:NUMERIC}, #{msbi_stamp:NUMERIC}, SYSDATE, #{msbi_remain:NUMERIC}, #{msbi_paid:INTEGER}, #{msbi_active:INTEGER}, #{msbi_print:INTEGER}, #{msbi_add_bill:INTEGER}, #{lus_id:INTEGER}, #{lspd_id:INTEGER}, #{lca_id:VARCHAR}, #{lwk_id:VARCHAR}, #{msbi_flag_topup:INTEGER}, #{lsrg_id:VARCHAR}, #{msbi_th_bak:INTEGER}, #{msbi_premi_bak:INTEGER}, #{msbi_persen_paid:INTEGER}, #{tgl_debet:DATE}, 1 )

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_DET_BILLING ( SELECT REG_SPAJ, 1, 1, ROWNUM, LSBS_ID, LSDBS_NUMBER, MSPR_PREMIUM, MSPR_DISCOUNT FROM EKA.MST_PRODUCT_INSURED WHERE ( REG_SPAJ = #{reg_spaj} ) AND ( MSTE_INSURED_NO = 1 ) AND ( MSPR_ACTIVE = 1 ) )
INSERT INTO EKA.MST_CNT_POLIS ( LCA_ID, LSBS_ID, MSCNP_VALUE, MSCNP_MAX ) VALUES ( #{as_cab:VARCHAR}} , #{as_bisnis:INTEGER} , #{ld_no:NUMERIC} , 999999999 )
${value}

insert into eka.mst_email (me_id, me_system, me_show_system, me_show_footer, me_from, me_from_alias, me_to, me_cc, me_bcc, me_subject, me_message, mec_id, me_html, me_status, me_status_message, me_count, me_lus_id, me_input_date, me_sent_date, priority, lje_id) values( #{me_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{me_system,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{me_show_system,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{me_show_footer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{me_from,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{me_from_alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{me_to,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{me_cc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{me_bcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{me_subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{me_message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mec_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{me_html,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{me_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{me_status_message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{me_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{me_lus_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{me_input_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{me_sent_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lje_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into eka.mst_akses_hist (MSAH_JENIS, MSAH_DATE, REQUEST_URL, MSAH_URI, MSAH_IP, REMOTE_ADDR, REMOTE_HOST, JENIS_ID, OTHER_ID, USER_ID, USER_PASS_ENTERED) VALUES ( #{MSAH_JENIS,jdbcType=INTEGER} , sysdate, #{REQUEST_URL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MSAH_URI,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MSAH_IP,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{REMOTE_ADDR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{REMOTE_HOST,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{JENIS_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{OTHER_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{USER_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{USER_PASS_ENTERED,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into EKA.LST_HIST_ACTIVITY_WS (CLIENT_ID, PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_DATE, PROCESS_DESC, PROCESS_RESULT, METHOD, MSAH_IP, START_DATE,ERR) values(#{CLIENT_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{PROCESS_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER},SYSDATE, #{PROCESS_DESC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PROCESS_RESULT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{METHOD,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{MSAH_IP,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{START_DATE,jdbcType=DATE},#{ERR,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into EKA.LST_HIST_ACTIVITY_WS_OUT (ID, CLIENT_ID, JENIS_ID, PROCESS_API, PROCESS_DESC, HTTP_STATUS, RESULT, METHOD) VALUES ( #{ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CLIENT_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{JENIS_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{PROCESS_API, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PROCESS_DESC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{HTTP_STATUS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RESULT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{METHOD,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

INSERT INTO eka.mst_url_secure (id_secure_1, id_secure_2, id_encrypt_1, id_encrypt_2, key_id, link, create_date) VALUES (#{sec_1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sec_2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encrypt_1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encrypt_2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO EKA.SMSSERVER_OUT( TYPE , RECIPIENT , TEXT , WAP_URL , WAP_EXPIRY_DATE , WAP_SIGNAL , CREATE_DATE , ORIGINATOR , ENCODING , STATUS_REPORT , FLASH_SMS , SRC_PORT , DST_PORT , SENT_DATE , REF_NO , PRIORITY , STATUS , ERRORS , GATEWAY_ID , LUS_ID , ID_REFRENCE , JENIS , LJS_ID , MSPO_POLICY_NO , REG_SPAJ ) values ( upper(#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , upper(EKA.UTILS.STANDARD_HP(#{recipient,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) , #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , upper(#{wap_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , #{wap_expiry_date,jdbcType=DATE} , upper(#{wap_signal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , sysdate , upper(EKA.UTILS.STANDARD_HP(#{originator,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) , upper(#{encoding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , #{status_report,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{flash_sms,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{src_port,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{dst_port,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{sent_date,jdbcType=DATE} , upper(#{ref_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER} , 'U' , #{errors,jdbcType=INTEGER} , EKA.UTILS.SMS_GATEWAY(#{recipient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , #{lus_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{id_refrence,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{jenis,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{ljs_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{mspo_policy_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{reg_spaj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into EKA.MST_SPAJ_CRT ( NAME_PP, BOD_PP, AGE_PP, BEGDATE, INSPERIOD, ADDRESS, NAME_TT, BOD_TT, AGE_TT, LSBS_ID, LSDBS_NUMBER, PREMI, UP, MSAG_ID, NO_SPAJ_GADGET, NO_TEMP, NO_POLICY, CERTIFICATE_DATE ) values ( #{nama_pp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bod_pp,jdbcType=DATE}, #{age_pp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{begdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{insperiod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name_tt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bod_tt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{age_tt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lsbs_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lsdbs_number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{premi, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{up,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{msag_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no_spaj_gadget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no_temp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no_policy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate )
